languages.text: "Эта игровая доска заключена в оковы из багряного и черного. Цвета такие насыщенные... Но как это возможно? Обычно предметы источают лишь отголоски красок своих хозяев".

traits.locale_text: "Эта игровая доска заключена в оковы из багряного и черного. Цвета такие насыщенные... Но как это возможно? Обычно предметы источают лишь отголоски красок своих хозяев.

languages.text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."
languages.original_text: "Эта игровая доска заключена в оковы из багряного и черного. Цвета такие насыщенные... Но как это возможно? Обычно предметы источают лишь отголоски красок своих хозяев".

traits.locale_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours.
"This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours.
"This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours.
"This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours.
"This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours.

languages.text: «Este tablero de juego está sujeto con cadenas de carmesí y negro. Los colores son tan vivos... ¿Pero cómo es posible? Normalmente los objetos solo exudan ecos distantes de los colores de sus propietarios».
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: «Este tablero de juego está sujeto con cadenas de carmesí y negro. Los colores son tan vivos... ¿Pero cómo es posible? Normalmente los objetos solo exudan ecos distantes de los colores de sus propietarios.

languages.text: 「この遊戯盤は真紅と黒の鎖で縛られています。とても鮮やかな色をしていますが...なぜ、こんなことが可能なのでしょう？通常、物体が発するのは所有者の色の残響だけのはずです」
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: 「この遊戯盤は真紅と黒の鎖で縛られています。とても鮮やかな色をしていますが...なぜ、こんなことが可能なのでしょう？通常、物体が発するのは所有者の色の残響だけのはずです」

languages.text: “深红色和黑色的镣铐束缚着这个棋盘。如此斑斓的色彩……但这怎么可能？通常情况下，物体应该只反射出主人残留的色彩才对。”
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: “深红色和黑色的镣铐束缚着这个棋盘。如此斑斓的色彩……但这怎么可能？通常情况下，物体应该只反射出主人残留的色彩才对。”

languages.text: « Ce plateau de jeu est entravé par des chaînes pourpres et noires. Les couleurs sont si riches... Mais comment est-ce possible ? Normalement, les objets n'exsudent que de lointains échos des couleurs de leur propriétaire. »
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: « Ce plateau de jeu est entravé par des chaînes pourpres et noires. Les couleurs sont si riches... Mais comment est-ce possible ? Normalement, les objets n'exsudent que de lointains échos des couleurs de leur propriétaire. »

languages.text: "Dieses Spielbrett ist an blutrote und schwarze Ketten gelegt. Die Farben sind extrem intensiv ... Aber wie ist das möglich? Normalerweise strahlen Objekte immer nur ferne Echos der Farben seines Besitzers aus."
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Spielbrett ist an blutrote und schwarze Ketten gelegt. Die Farben sind extrem intensiv ... Aber wie ist das möglich? Normalerweise strahlen Objekte immer nur ferne Echos der Farben seines Besitzers aus."

languages.text: "Bu oyun tahtası, kızıl ve siyah zincirlere vurulmuş. Renkleri çok zengin... Bu nasıl mümkün olabilir? Normalde nesneler, yalnızca sahiplerinin renklerinin uzak yankılarını yayar."
languages.original_text: "This game board is chained in crimson and black shackles. The colours are so rich... But how is this possible? Normally, an object only exudes distant echoes of its owner's colours."

traits.locale_text: "Bu oyun tahtası, kızıl ve siyah zincirlere vurulmuş. Renkleri çok zengin... Bu nasıl mümkün olabilir? Normalde bir nesne, yalnızca sahibine ait renklerin uzaklardan gelen yankısını yayar."
